Pre-Game Insights: Golden State Warriors finished last season with a 46-36 overall record and 26-26 in Western Conference play.
New Orleans Pelicans finished last season with a 49-33 overall record and 30-22 in Western Conference play.
Golden State Warriors averaged 117.8 points per game last season, while New Orleans Pelicans averaged 17.6 points off of turnovers and 14.0 second-chance points last season.
Golden State Warriors have key players Stephen Curry (out with peroneal) and Andrew Wiggins (day to day with back) injured.
New Orleans Pelicans have Trey Murphy III (out with hamstring) and Dejounte Murray (out with hand) injured.
